"Top quality in sales and service." "Jason was easy to work with, knowledgeable, and delivered as promised." "They also repaired and painted the chimney for a minimal charge."

Jared and his team came out, measured, came back a week later and did an amazing job. The staff was professional, friendly, and very respectful. We had them do a standing seam roof on the front porch and a small eyebrow and we just love it! Great work! Great team! More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you sir. Jared was talking about how beautiful your home turned out!

We had a bad hail storm come through and it destroyed our roof, gutters, fence and windows. Chris from MyPro Construction handled our work project and he was amazing! He's very personable and easy to work with.  MyPro handled the repairs … More Response from the owner a month ago
Thanks Kent! Super happy you had a great experience! Chris is a very trustworthy man.

MyPro Construction did an excellent job in replacing my roof and helping me deal with the insurance company. After a windstorm earlier this year I had MyPro evaluate my roof, it was determined the roof should be completely replaced. My … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thanks for hanging on for the long ride Peter and trusting us. So grateful it turned out in your favor!
